►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week Rivian introduced the Also TM-B which is an e-bike with pedal by wire systems, Samsung launches the Galaxy XR as a competitor to the Vision Pro, and the iPhone Air and Galaxy S25 Edge are showing nobody wants thin phones.

Episode 273
 
This video on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/tfc-rivian-reinvented-the-ebike
